meta.title: Form Select
meta.description: Custom <select> component using cross-browser custom styles. Optionally generate <option> entries based on an array, array of objects.

props.description: Current value of the select. Should be set to an array when the 'multiple' prop is set
When set, allows multiple options to be selected (multi-select)
When set to a number larger than 0, will set the number of display option rows. Note not all browser will respect this setting
Optional value to set for the 'aria-invalid' attribute. Supported values are 'true' and 'false'. If not set, the 'state' prop will dictate the value

slots.name: first
slots.description: Slot to place option tags above options provided via options prop

events.description: Emitted with the select value changes

args.description: current selected value(s) of the select.

events.description: Emitted with the select value changes via user interaction

args.description: current selected value(s) of the select.
